results.title: Investigating the Therapeutic Effects of Bushen Huoxue Formula Combined with Aerobic Exercise on Reproductive Function in Obese Polycystic Ovary Syndrome: An Experimental Study Based on the Integration of Sports and Medicine.
results.text_hl: Successfully modeled @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ were randomly allocated into the @<m>DISEASE_Disease_Models_Animal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004195 @@@MOD@@@ group (n=12), @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group (MET, n=12), Bushen Huoxue Formula group (BHF, n=12), aerobic exercise group (AE, n=12), and BHF combined with AE group (COMB, n=12).
